verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> it נִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard לְסַנְבַלַּ֣ט <WH5571> Now it came to pass when Sanballat וְ֠טוֹבִיָּה <WH2900> and Tobiah וּלְגֶ֨שֶׁם <WH1654> and Geshem הָֽעַרְבִ֜י <WH6163> the Arabian וּלְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and the rest אֹֽיְבֵ֗ינוּ <WH341> of our enemies כִּ֤י <WH3588> for בָנִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1129> that I had builded אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> the wall וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and no נ֥וֹתַר <WH3498> left בָּ֖הּ פָּ֑רֶץ <WH6556> and [that] there was no breach גַּ֚ם <WH1571> although עַד־ <WH5704> that הָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he דְּלָת֖וֹת <WH1817> the doors לֹא־ <WH3808> and no הֶעֱמַ֥דְתִּי <WH5975> I had not set up בַשְּׁעָרִֽים׃ <WH8179> the gates

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent סַנְבַלַּ֤ט <WH5571> That Sanballat וְגֶ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1654> and Geshem אֵלַ֣י <WH413> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto me saying לְכָ֞ה <WH1980> Come וְנִֽוָּעֲדָ֥ה <WH3259> let us meet יַחְדָּ֛ו <WH3162> together בַּכְּפִירִ֖ים <WH3715> in [some one of] the villages בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <WH1237> in the plain אוֹנ֑וֹ <WH207> of Ono וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they חֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <WH2803> But they thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do לִ֖י רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> me mischief

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֨ה <WH7971> And I sent עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> and מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> messengers לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto them saying מְלָאכָ֤ה <WH4399> work גְדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> a great אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> I [am] doing וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> so that I cannot לָרֶ֑דֶת <WH3381> come down לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why תִשְׁבַּ֤ת <WH7673> cease הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <WH4399> why should the work כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whilst אַרְפֶּ֔הָ <WH7503> I leave וְיָרַדְתִּ֖י <WH3381> it and come down אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <WH7971> Yet they sent אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> after this sort הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> unto me four פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וָאָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> and I answered אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> them after the same manner הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> the same ס

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> Then sent אֵלַ֨י <WH413> then סַנְבַלַּ֜ט <WH5571> Sanballat כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> unto me in like manner הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> the same פַּ֥עַם <WH6471> time חֲמִישִׁ֖ית <WH2549> the fifth אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲר֑וֹ <WH5288> his servant וְאִגֶּ֥רֶת <WH107> letter פְּתוּחָ֖ה <WH6605> with an open בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

כָּת֣וּב <WH3789> Wherein [was] written בָּ֗הּ בַּגּוֹיִ֤ם <WH1471> among the heathen נִשְׁמָע֙ <WH8085> It is reported וְגַשְׁמ֣וּ <WH1654> and Gashmu אֹמֵ֔ר <WH559> saith אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you וְהַיְּהוּדִים֙ <WH3064> [it that] thou and the Jews חֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH2803> think לִמְר֔וֹד <WH4775> to rebel עַל־ <WH5921> which כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> for which cause אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בוֹנֶ֖ה <WH1129> thou buildest הַחוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> the wall וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you הֹוֶ֤ה <WH1933> that thou mayest be לָהֶם֙ לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> their king כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> according to these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> to these

וְגַם־ <WH1571> have also נְבִיאִ֡ים <WH5030> prophets הֶעֱמַ֣דְתָּ <WH5975> And thou hast also appointed לִקְרֹא֩ <WH7121> to preach עָלֶ֨יךָ <WH5921> concerning בִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of thee at Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying מֶ֚לֶךְ <WH4428> [There is] a king בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> in Judah וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now יִשָּׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> and now shall it be reported לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> according to these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> to these וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now לְכָ֔ה <WH1980> come וְנִֽוָּעֲצָ֖ה <WH3289> now therefore and let us take counsel יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together ס

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֤ה <WH7971> Then I sent אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto him saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not נִֽהְיָה֙ <WH1961> done כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> no such things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> Such אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you אוֹמֵ֑ר <WH559> as thou sayest כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מִֽלִּבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> them out of thine own heart אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בוֹדָֽאם׃ <WH908> but thou feignest

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כֻלָּ֗ם <WH3605> for all מְיָֽרְאִ֤ים <WH3372> For they all made us afraid אוֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH853> לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יִרְפּ֧וּ <WH7503> shall be weakened יְדֵיהֶ֛ם <WH3027> Their hands מִן־ <WH4480> with הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> from the work וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and it תֵעָשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> that it be not done וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now חַזֵּ֥ק <WH2388> Now therefore [O God] strengthen אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָֽי׃ <WH3027> my hands

וַאֲנִי־ <WH589> I בָ֗אתִי <WH935> Afterward I came בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house שְֽׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <WH8098> of Shemaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son דְּלָיָ֛ה <WH1806> of Delaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְהֵֽיטַבְאֵ֖ל <WH4105> of Mehetabeel וְה֣וּא <WH1931> who עָצ֑וּר <WH6113> who [was] shut up וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> and he said נִוָּעֵד֩ <WH3259> Let us meet together אֶל־ <WH413> in בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> within הַֽהֵיכָ֗ל <WH1964> the temple וְנִסְגְּרָה֙ <WH5462> and let us shut דַּלְת֣וֹת <WH1817> the doors הַהֵיכָ֔ל <WH1964> of the temple כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בָּאִ֣ים <WH935> for they will come לְהָרְגֶ֔ךָ <WH2026> to slay וְלַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> thee yea in the night בָּאִ֥ים <WH935> will they come לְהָרְגֶֽךָ׃ <WH2026> to slay

וָאֹמְרָ֗ה <WH559> And I said הַאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> a man כָּמ֙וֹנִי֙ <WH3644> Should such יִבְרָ֔ח <WH1272> as I flee וּמִ֥י <WH4310> any כָמ֛וֹנִי <WH3644> like אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I יָב֥וֹא <WH935> ? and who [is there] that [being] as I [am] would go אֶל־ <WH413> into הַהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> into the temple וָחָ֑י <WH2425> to save his life לֹ֖א <WH3808> not אָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> ? I will not go in

וָאַכִּ֕ירָה <WH5234> And lo I perceived וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> surely לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> that God שְׁלָח֑וֹ <WH7971> had not sent כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הַנְּבוּאָה֙ <WH5016> this prophecy דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> him but that he pronounced עָלַ֔י <WH5921> against וְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <WH2900> against me for Tobiah וְסַנְבַלַּ֖ט <WH5571> and Sanballat שְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <WH7936> had hired

לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> this שָׂכוּר֙ <WH7936> Therefore [was] he hired ה֔וּא <WH1931> he לְמַֽעַן־ <WH4616> reason אִירָ֥א <WH3372> that I should be afraid וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and do so כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> accordingly וְחָטָ֑אתִי <WH2398> and sin וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> have לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> report רָ֔ע <WH7451> and [that] they might have [matter] for an evil לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> order יְחָֽרְפֽוּנִי׃ <WH2778> that they might reproach פ

זָכְרָ֧ה <WH2142> think אֱלֹהַ֛י <WH430> My God לְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <WH2900> thou upon Tobiah וּלְסַנְבַלַּ֖ט <WH5571> and Sanballat כְּמַעֲשָׂ֣יו <WH4639> according to these their works אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> to these וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> and also לְנוֹעַדְיָ֤ה <WH5129> Noadiah הַנְּבִיאָה֙ <WH5031> and on the prophetess וּלְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and the rest הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הָי֖וּ <WH1961> were to מְיָֽרְאִ֥ים <WH3372> that would have put me in fear אוֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

וַתִּשְׁלַם֙ <WH7999> was finished הַֽחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> So the wall בְּעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> in the twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> and fifth לֶאֱל֑וּל <WH435> [day] of [the month] Elul לַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> in fifty וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> and two יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> heard כָּל־ <WH3605> all א֣וֹיְבֵ֔ינוּ <WH341> And it came to pass that when all our enemies וַיִּֽרְא֗וּ <WH7200> saw כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> [thereof] and all the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after סְבִֽיבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH5439> that [were] about us וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> cast down מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> [these things] they were much בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> in their own eyes וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> for they perceived כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מֵאֵ֣ת <WH854> for אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> was wrought הַמְּלָאכָ֥ה <WH4399> that this work הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

גַּ֣ם ׀ <WH1571> Also בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> Moreover in those days הָהֵ֗ם <WH1992> those מַרְבִּ֞ים <WH7235> many חֹרֵ֤י <WH2715> the nobles יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah אִגְּרֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH107> letters הוֹלְכ֖וֹת <WH1980> sent עַל־ <WH5921> unto טוֹבִיָּ֑ה <WH2900> unto Tobiah וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and לְטוֹבִיָּ֖ה <WH2900> and [the letters] of Tobiah בָּא֥וֹת <WH935> came אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> to him

כִּי־ <WH3588> because רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> For [there were] many בִּֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> in Judah בַּעֲלֵ֤י <WH1167> were bound שְׁבוּעָה֙ <WH7621> oath ל֔וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> because חָתָ֥ן <WH2860> unto him because he [was] the son in law ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לִשְׁכַנְיָ֣ה <WH7935> of Shechaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָרַ֑ח <WH733> of Arah וִֽיהוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3076> Johanan בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> and his son לָקַ֕ח <WH3947> had taken אֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> of Meshullam בֶּ֥ן <WH1121> the son בֶּֽרֶכְיָֽה׃ <WH1296> of Berechiah

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Moreover טוֹבֹתָ֗יו <WH2896> his good deeds הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become אֹמְרִים֙ <WH559> Also they reported לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before וּדְבָרַ֕י <WH1697> my words הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become מוֹצִיאִ֖ים <WH3318> me and uttered ל֑וֹ אִגְּר֛וֹת <WH107> letters שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent טוֹבִיָּ֖ה <WH2900> to him [And] Tobiah לְיָֽרְאֵֽנִי׃ <WH3372> to put me in fear
